statements: SELECT user_id, points_earned, last_updated FROM loyalty_points WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT points_earned, user_id, last_updated FROM loyalty_points WHERE points_earned > 50;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points WHERE last_updated >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT user_id, points_earned FROM loyalty_points WHERE points_earned < 100 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM loyalty_points;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM loyalty_points GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_points > 1000;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, last_updated FROM loyalty_points WHERE points_earned > 50 ORDER BY points_earned ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points WHERE points_earned BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND points_earned > 0 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, MIN(points_earned) AS min_points, MAX(points_earned) AS max_points FROM loyalty_points;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM users WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM users ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 500;
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM users WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required < 500 ORDER BY reward_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM users WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY user_name ASC, loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT user_name, r.reward_name, r.points_required FROM users u JOIN rewards r ON u.loyalty_points >= r.points_required WHERE u.user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_points;
SELECT user_id, points FROM loyalty_points WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards ORDER BY points_required DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE total_points > 1000 ORDER BY total_points ASC, username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, total_points FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards;
SELECT user_id, total_points FROM users WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, points FROM loyalty_points ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT user_id, reward_id, redeem_date FROM user_rewards ORDER BY redeem_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT users.username, rewards.reward_name FROM users JOIN user_rewards ON users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE users.loyalty_points >= rewards.points_required;
SELECT users.username, SUM(transactions.points_earned) AS total_points FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(user_rewards.reward_id) AS total_rewards FROM users LEFT JOIN user_rewards ON users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_rewards > 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required > 100;
SELECT u.name, r.reward_name FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN rewards r ON t.reward_id = r.reward_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards ORDER BY points_required DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM user_points GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_points > 100;

SELECT u.name, r.reward_name, t.points_spent, t.transaction_date FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN rewards r ON t.reward_id = r.reward_id WHERE t.points_spent > 50 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
